# Problem 1

Here is  **code chunk** the creates a data frame:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df_1 = tibble(
              a = rnorm(10),
              b = ifelse(a>0, 1, 0),
              c = c("a", "Character", "vector", "of", "length", "ten", "in", "column", "lettered", "c"),
              d = factor(c("low", "medium", "high",           "low","medium", "high",                             "low","medium", "high", "low")))
```

# Section 2

I can take the mean of the sample, too!

THe code chunk below creates a dataframe and generates a plot.
```{r plot_example}


plot_df= tibble(x = rnorm(500, mean = 2, sd = 4),
                  y = 3 - 4.2 * x + rnorm(500))
                  
ggplot(plot_df,aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point()

```
